Extract parameter estimates from flexsurv object

Source: R/flexsurv-tools.R
extract_flexsurv.Rd

extract_flexsurv extracts estimates from a flexsurv object in and transform them to match the RoBSA output.

extract_flexsurv(fit)

Arguments

fit

an object fitted with the flexsurv::flexsurvreg function

Value

extract_flexsurv return list of estimates lists for each parameter.
